metadata.title: QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Truffles

text: QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Truffles

Surprise someone special with the decadent and delicious holiday gift of NESTLÉ QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Truffles. Each carton opens up to individually wrapped milk chocolate truffles with a smooth hazelnut flavoured centre and coated in crunchy caramelized hazelnut pieces. Indulgent, enticing and sure to bring a smile to anyone's face, these delightful sweet treats are perfect for sharing and make for a lovely gift to cherish those special holiday moments.
QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate TrufflesFeatures and Benefits
QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate Truffles are indulgent milk chocolate truffles with a smooth hazelnut flavoured centre, coated in crunchy caramelized hazelnut pieces
Made easy to gift to your loved ones – each carton contains individually wrapped truffles perfect for sharing
Made with all natural flavours and no artificial colours
We purchase 100% Sustainably Sourced Cocoa certified by UTZ, as part of the NESTLÉ COCOA PLAN. We work with UTZ and farmers to improve the quality of their products and strengthen their communities
QUALITY STREET has been proudly part of British heritage since 1936
QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate TrufflesNutrition Information

QUALITY STREET Hazelnut Milk Chocolate TrufflesIngredients
Sugars (sugar, glucose, honey), unsweetened chocolate, modified milk ingredients, sorbitol, hazelnuts, cocoa butter, sunflower lecithin, natural flavour, invertase.
